quotes.quote: Dude, I almost had you.
I'll have the tuna. No crust.
I need one of these. One of the big ones. Actually, you know what? Let's make it two. And Harry, I need em by tonight
But if I win I take the cash and I take the respect.
What's the retail on one of those?
I owe you a ten-second car.
I bet he's got over a hundred grand under the hood.
Hector is going to be running 3 Honda Civics with spoon engines. And on top of that he just came into Harry's and he ordered 3 T66 turbos, with NOS, and a Motec system exhaust.
It doesn't matter if you win by an inch or mile. Winning is winning.
Because the BUSTER kept me out of handcuffs. He didn't just run back to the fort. The buster brought me back.
I live my life a quarter mile at a time. For those ten seconds or less, I'm free.
You break her heart I'll break your neck.
I have faith in you, but this isn't a junkyard. This is a garage.
What'd you put in that sandwich?
I never narc'd on nobody.
You know you owe me a ten second car.
Yeah and a stand alone fuel management system. Not a bad way to spend ten thousand dollars.
What do they plan on racing with? Hopes and dreams?
I smell skanks. Why don't you girls just pack it up before I leave treadmarks on your face.
If you want ass why don't you hit Hollywood Boulevard. You want an adrenaline rush? It'll be two large, right here right now.
Praying to the car gods, man.
You look a bit tired... I think you should go upstairs and give me a massage.
Every day for the last three weeks you've been coming in here and you've been asking me how the tuna is. Now, it was crappy yesterday, it was crappy the day before and guess what? It hasn't changed.
You know, my brother likes you. Usually he doesn't like anybody.
And you definitely... definitely need a shower.
The gang? No, they don't call themselves a gang. They're a team, they call themselves a team.
Jesus Christ, Dom! Would you get out here please? I'm sick of this shit!
You could push this across the finish line, or tow it.
You know what? This will decimate all, after, you put about fifteen grand in it or more. If we have to, overnight parts from Japan.
This fool is running a Honda 200. I'll win. then me and my dad can roll together when he gets out of prison. It's all good.
He's beautiful.

Dear Heavenly... uh... spirit. Thank you. Thank you for providing us with the direct-port nitrous... uh... injection, four-core intercoolers, an' ball-bearing turbos, and... um... titanium valve springs. Thank you.
Look who it is! Old Coyote's 'R' Us! I thought you weren't hungy pumpkin.
Roads closed pizza boy. Find another way home.
I like his haircut.
Oh shit! We got cops, cops, cops, cops!
Hey Dom. We were just about to go look for you.
Yo Dom! Why'd you bring the busta here?
Bullshit asshole, none likes the tuna here!
What is this guy sandwich crazy or something?
There were mass cops out there, that shit was orchestrated.
Nah, Mia. I'm talking to the punk. Wear your favorite dress, 'cause when you're done I'm putting you on the street where you belong.
